doc.field: U.S. BUSINESS LOANS FELL 896 MLN DLRS

Business loans on the books of major U.S. banks, excluding acceptances, fell 896 mln dlrs to 275.61 billion in the week ended June 10, the Federal Reserve Board said. The Fed said that business loans including acceptances fell 546 mln dlrs to 278.12 billion dlrs.
Reuter
